name: Flying Shield
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
text: The shield is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the shield must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the shield remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal shield.

action.name: Longshield
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 224
